attributes.action: stop using public funds to prop up unsound banking practices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a tax payer why should i subsidise banks whose methods border on the criminal, paying insanely inflated bonuses whilst ordinary companies are allowed to go bankrupt and ordinary employees lose their jobs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
